articles.content: On Monday, the US EPA announced new fuel economy rules that ratchet up the pressure on automakers to manufacture more fuel efficient vehicles. The devil is in the details, of course. Let’s begin at t… [+10582 chars]

articles.title: The Saddest Austin Restaurant Closures in 2021 - Eater Austin
articles.description: Austin food experts share their saddest Austin restaurant shutters of 2021, from dim sum hub New Fortune to French bistro Chez Nous to beer bar Craft Pride

articles.author: Zachary Brennan
articles.title: Alzheimer's experts call on FDA to pull Biogen's Aduhelm - Endpoints News
articles.description: Alzheimer’s disease researchers along with medical professors from Harvard and Johns Hopkins issued a formal statement Monday asking the FDA to quickly pull Biogen's Aduhelm from the market.
articles.content:
The FDA on Wednesday signed off on Pfizer’s Covid-19 pills, which are meant to help keep people out of the hospital.
The news comes at a crucial moment, as the Omicron variant has taken over Delta a… [+540 chars]
